listItems: Working on a greenfield, customer-facing product for financial clients
Designed and built a dynamic, schema-driven UI dashboard using TypeScript and React, enabling real-time customisation without code changes
Leveraged React Hook Form for dynamic form generation and validation and Tanstack React Query for performant async data fetching and intelligent UI caching
Designed and implemented route-guarding and role-based access control to secure sensitive app routes and to prevent unauthorised access
Ensured accessibility compliance by adhering to WCAG 2.1 standards, including semantic HTML, ARIA roles, keyboard support and screen reader compatibility
Built comprehensive unit and integration tests using Jest, React Testing Library, Mock Service Worker and Playwright, ensuring high test coverage and reducing regression risk
Contributed to a hybrid microservices architecture using both on-premise and AWS serverless infrastructure
Built event-driven services using AWS MSK Kafka, publishing domain events to support decoupled interactions between microservices
Developed and extended RESTful API endpoints and core business logic within a Java Spring backend service
Built a Java 17 Micronaut AWS Lambda to expose RESTful API endpoints and to encapsulate business logic and coordinate with distributed services
Enhanced an AWS Lambda to persist data in DynamoDB with JSON Schema 2020-12 based validation, improving backend data integrity
Implemented resilient backend logic with parallel and retryable service calls to improve fault tolerance and ensure reliability in distributed workflows
Maintained and authored Swagger/OpenAPI documentation to support API clarity and effective collaboration between services users
1st Year : BI Developer - Supported QlikView to Qlik Sense migration for internal reporting
2nd Year : UI developer - Maintained and updated the external Careers Portal using HTML, CSS, JavaScript and jQuery
Created a tool in C# and WinForms to query a database for statistics
Built a C# library to support transition from FTP to a 3rd party service
Implemented clean-up and file deletion for a components-updating tool, based on XML configuration
Developed a monitoring program which sends dynamically generated (T4 TT) HTML alert emails
Extended the functionality of the monitoring app to the browser using ASP.NET (MVC), JavaScript
